name: UMaterialExpressionMaterialXFractal3D
doc:
Zero-centered 3D Fractal noise in 1, 2, 3 or 4 channels, created by summing several
octaves of 3D Perlin noise, increasing the frequency and decreasing the amplitude at each octave.

ConstAmplitude: only used if Amplitude is not hooked up
ConstOctaves: only used if Octaves is not hooked up
ConstLacunarity: only used if Lacunarity is not hooked up
ConstDiminish: only used if Diminish is not hooked up
Scale: can also be done with a multiply on the Position
bTurbulence: How multiple frequencies are getting combined
Levels: 1 = fast but little detail, .. larger numbers cost more performance
